projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h3. Problem:

MediaStore.Images.Media.INTERNAL_CONTENT_URI & 
MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI are not implemented in TItanium

h3. Expected behavior:

Customer wants to use:

MediaStore.Images.Media.INTERNAL_CONTENT_URI
MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI

in Titanium.

h3.More info:
http://developer.android.com/reference/android/provider/MediaStore.Images.Media.html

h3. Helpdesk:
APP-198171
fields.summary: Android: MediaStore.Images.Media.INTERNAL_CONTENT_URI & MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI are not implemented in Titanium
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.9.201201311849
Simulator
Android API: Android 2.3.3
Titanium SDK: 1.7.5, 1.8.0.1 & !.8.1
